segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need some remedies for an upset stomach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you also suffering from pain and fever ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and I also have the runs
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll give you some tablets that should make you feel better . One moment , please . Here you are . Take these tablets three times a day swallow them with water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long should I continue taking them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take them for two days.If your symptoms persist for more than two days , you should see a doctor Also , be sure to drink plenty of water to prevent dehydration .
segments.speaker: S1
